display_html:
data ZipProd :: (Type -> Type -> Type) -> [Type] -> [Type] -> Type where
  • ZPØ :: ZipProd f '[] '[]
  • (:<<) :: f a b -> ZipProd f as bs -> ZipProd f (a ': as) (b ': bs)
name: ZipProd ZPÃ˜ :<<

display_html: onlyZP :: f a b -> ZipProd f '[a] '[b]
name: onlyZP

display_html: headZP :: ZipProd f (a ': as) (b ': bs) -> f a b
name: headZP

display_html: tailZP :: ZipProd f (a ': as) (b ': bs) -> ZipProd f as bs
name: tailZP

display_html: traverseZP :: forall h f g as bs. Applicative h => (forall x y. f x y -> h (g x y)) -> ZipProd f as bs -> h (ZipProd g as bs)
name: traverseZP

display_html: traverseZP_ :: forall h f as bs. Applicative h => (forall x y. f x y -> h ()) -> ZipProd f as bs -> h ()
name: traverseZP_

display_html: mapZP :: (forall x y. f x y -> g x y) -> ZipProd f as bs -> ZipProd g as bs
name: mapZP

display_html: traverseZP1 :: forall h f g as bs. Applicative h => (forall x y. f x y -> h (g x)) -> ZipProd f as bs -> h (Rec g as)
name: traverseZP1

display_html: traverseZP2 :: forall h f g as bs. Applicative h => (forall x y. f x y -> h (g y)) -> ZipProd f as bs -> h (Rec g bs)
name: traverseZP2

class Ref m a v | v -> a where
  • thawRef :: a -> m v
  • freezeRef :: v -> m a
  • copyRef :: v -> a -> m ()
  • modifyRef :: v -> (a -> a) -> m ()
  • modifyRef' :: v -> (a -> a) -> m ()
  • updateRef :: v -> (a -> (a, b)) -> m b
  • updateRef' :: v -> (a -> (a, b)) -> m b
name: Ref thawRef freezeRef updateRef copyRef modifyRef modifyRef' updateRef'

display_html:
data RefVal :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type -> Type where
  • RVl :: Ref m a v => a -> RefVal m a v
name: RefVal RVl

display_html:
data RefVar :: (Type -> Type) -> Type -> Type -> Type where
  • RVr :: Ref m a v => v -> RefVar m a v
name: RefVar RVr

display_html: type RefVals m = ZipProd (RefVal m)
name: RefVals

display_html: type RefVars m = ZipProd (RefVar m)
name: RefVars

display_html: thawRefs :: Applicative m => RefVals m as vs -> m (RefVars m as vs)
name: thawRefs

display_html: freezeRefs :: Applicative m => RefVars m as vs -> m (Rec Identity as)
name: freezeRefs

display_html: pullRefs :: Applicative m => RefVars m as vs -> m (RefVals m as vs)
name: pullRefs

class Additive a where

class Scaling c a => Metric c a where

  • norm_2 :: a -> c
  • quadrance :: a -> c

class (AdditiveInPlace m v a, Scaling c a) => ScalingInPlace m v c a where

name: ScalingInPlace .*= .*+=

display_html: type Diff a = a
